meanings.definition: A small, low-growing plant with white flowers and red berries.
meanings.sent1: The bunchberry in the forest had delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I picked a bunchberry to show my friend its red berries.
meanings.sent3: The bunchberry seemed to be wearing a tiny white crown of flowers.
meanings.sent4: The bunchberry stood out like a small jewel among the green leaves.
meanings.sent5: The bunchberry's red berries looked like little drops of blood on the forest floor.

meanings.definition: A cluster or group of bunchberry plants.
meanings.sent1: The bunchberry cluster covered a small area of the forest floor.
meanings.sent2: We admired the beauty of the bunchberry bunch near the stream.
meanings.sent3: The bunchberry group seemed to be having a tiny party in the woods.
meanings.sent4: The bunchberry gathering created a vibrant splash of color in the greenery.
meanings.sent5: The bunchberry cluster resembled a gathering of tiny red and white lanterns.
